Custom Industrial

Custom Industrial
Refrigeration Sytems

Straightline Refrigeration offers expert design-build and plan/spec installation of industrial refrigeration systems.

Innovation + Refrigeration

With years of ammonia experience, Straightline Refrigeration provides exceptional design, building and installation of fully custom industrial refrigeration systems. With a team of carefully assembled experts, we manage each job with the highest standards for customer service, product development, performance and safety.

Featured Project Title

Featured project description

Our Approach—A Major Cool Factor

At Straightline Refrigeration, you’ll have one straight line of communication through all stages of your project. The project foreman will serve as your main contact but works collaboratively with a full support team throughout every stage of the project from initial consultation to project completion. With direct access to the experts who actually get their hands dirty, you’ll find our team to be responsive, capable and flexible to accommodate your unique situation and needs.
